body.contents:
Tech
2024년 GitHub Repositories 탐방기
2024년 새해 기념으로 그 동안 살펴보고 싶었던 GitHub Repositories를 살펴보자.

- [evanw/esbuild](https://github.com/evanw/esbuild)
- [changesets/changesets](https://github.com/changesets/changesets)
- [eslint/eslint](https://github.com/eslint/eslint)
- [prettier/prettier](https://github.com/prettier/prettier)
- [webpack/enhanced-resolve](https://github.com/webpack/enhanced-resolve)
- [yarnpkg/berry](https://github.com/yarnpkg/berry/blob/master/packages/yarnpkg-pnp/sources/node/resolve.js#L517C10-L517C54)
- [withastro/astro](https://github.com/withastro/astro)
